title: Virtual Assitant
job_overview:
Job Title: Remote Secretary – Valuation Report Support (UK Surveying Practice)
Company: Copping Joyce Surveyors
Location: Remote (Philippines-based)
Working Hours: 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM UK time (equivalent to 4:00 PM – 12:00 AM Philippine time)

?

About Us
Copping Joyce is a London-based surveying practice specialising in valuations for commercial, residential, and specialist properties. We are known for our attention to detail, professionalism, and responsive client service.

We are currently seeking a highly organised and detail-oriented Secretary based in the Philippines to support our valuation team remotely. This role is ideal for someone who thrives in a structured environment and has strong communication skills.

?

Key Responsibilities
 • Assist in setting up and formatting valuation reports using provided templates
 • Organise and manage job files, reference documents, and data inputs to support valuers
 • Ensure all documents are accurate, complete, and meet company standards
 • Coordinate with valuers to ensure timely submission of reports
 • Maintain internal systems and tracking logs for active and completed jobs
 • Perform general administrative duties related to valuation support

?

Requirements
 • Proven administrative or secretarial experience (preferably with exposure to property, legal, or technical sectors)
 • Excellent written and verbal English communication skills
 • High attention to detail
 • Strong organisational skills with the ability to manage multiple tasks
 • Proficient in Microsoft Word, Excel, and general computer use
 • Reliable internet connection and a quiet work environment
 • Willingness to work UK business hours (4:00 PM – 12:00 AM PH time)

?

Desirable (Not Essential)
 • Familiarity with valuation or surveying terminology and workflows
 • Experience supporting UK-based professionals

?

What We Offer
 • Competitive salary (based on experience and UK/PH conversion)
 • Fully remote position with regular collaboration via email and video
 • Long-term opportunity with a professional and supportive team
 • Exposure to UK property industry standards and practice
